title: The richest people in America as of 2019
yAxis: Net worth in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net worth in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Months.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and lowest at Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX).
There is a difference of 108.7 between the maximum Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and minimum Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX).

max_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and lowest at Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX).
The second highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Month Bill Gates (Microsoft).
There is a difference of 108.7 between the maximum Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and minimum Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX).
Net worth in billion U.S. dollars at Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) is 131.0 , second place is Bill Gates (Microsoft) at 96.5, and thirdly is Warren Buffett (Berkshire Hathaway) at 82.5.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars has declined over the past 20 Months.
Month Charles Koch (Koch Industries), and David Koch (Koch Industries) have a similar Net worth in billion U.S. dollars that is 50.5.
The Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) tends to be 2.52 percent higher than average.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is 1039.3 if we add up values of all Months.
